title: Autophagy Benefits: How Longevity Science is Revolutionizing Cellular Repair for a Longer Life
description: Learn about autophagy benefits in longevity science. Understanding that cellular repair through autophagy can extend lifespan and improve healthy aging naturally.
content: Longevity scientists focus on autophagy due to its role in cellular repair, a process that degrades damaged proteins and organelles to maintain healthy cells. Autophagy benefits extend to reducing ag… [+7372 chars]
